about_the_game:
Keaton's Adventure is a cartoon 2D action adventure side scroller; self dubbed "R(cade)PG" (arcade role-playing platformer game) that takes you on a quest across the vast cosmos. 4 Billion years have passed and the Milkdromeda Galaxy has formed but not without flaws. The spirit of the galaxy has been fragmented. Restore balance to the universe by tending to the various needs of alien civilizations and defend against the Invading Ultralites that threaten their ecosystems; a sentient species born of nuclear pasta.

DISCOVER ULTRASHARDS

As Keaton and co. You wield the spirit of the Milkdromeda Galaxy in the form of an artifact known as an UltraShard. A crystalized fragment of power that represents the manifestation of a celestial being born from the cataclysmic fusion of the Milky Way and Andromeda Galaxy, in other words, the galaxy itself! With its power scattered across the galaxy these shards, among other relics, your help has been requested to get them back. Heed this cosmic calling to gather these shards to gain the power to combat the invading threat. Use the UltraShards to bring balance and restore power back to the Milkdromeda Galaxy!

STOMP OUT THE INVASION

Among the UltraShards; creatures known as "Ultralites", which have spawned as a byproduct of Milkdromeda collision are invading various systems and helplessly landing on nearby planets. The advent of Milkdromeda has brought disaster! Among the meteor showers, beings made of nuclear pasta which are impervious to all damage are making their homes on occupied planets.

Use the power of the UltraShard to fight fire with fire, utilizing a signature move known as the UltraStomp! An ability that manipulates gravity downward and accumulates damage dealt in the form of a combo, effortlessly defeat groups of Ultralites by chaining UltraStomps successively. As you collect more UltraShards, more UltraMoves become available to you!

EXPLORE THE COSMOS

With the help of the the UltraShard, you're given the means to traverse the galaxy efficiently. Explore various star systems and their interesting array of planets. Discover collectables and meet friends along the way to aid you in your adventure!
